MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL65 postcode area of Holyhead, affecting properties in Turkey Shore Road, London Road and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of  difficulty locating the cause of the power loss, and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.15PM on 26th January 2021
